en.title: SANSKRIT COURSES
en.subtitle: Online Sanskrit for Yoga · The Cultural Foundation of Yoga
en.intro: Sanskrit (संस्कृतम्), meaning 'the language of the gods', is one of the world's oldest linguistic systems and serves as the foundation of yoga philosophy and culture. In ancient India, it was the universal language for conveying knowledge, wisdom, and spiritual exploration. Whether you aim to read scriptures deeply, recite classics accurately, or integrate authentic mantra chanting into your yoga practice, this online course will provide you with a solid foundation.

zh.title: 梵语课程
zh.subtitle: 在线瑜伽梵语课 · 瑜伽的文化根基
zh.intro: 梵语（संस्कृतम्），意为'神的语言'，是世界上最古老的语言体系之一，更是瑜伽哲学与文化的根基。在古印度，它作为承载知识、智慧与灵性探索的通用语言。无论您是为了深度阅读典籍、精准诵读经典，还是将纯正的咒语念诵融入瑜伽练习，本在线课程都将为您奠定坚实的基础。
